briefTitle: Combined Intra-articular Shoulder Injection and Stellate Ganglion Block in Chronic Post-mastectomy Shoulder Pain
officialTitle: Combined Platelet Rich Plasma Intra-articular Shoulder Injection and Stellate Ganglion Block. A New Technique for Management of Chronic Post-mastectomy Shoulder Pain Syndrome
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* post-mastectomy shoulder pain
* age of 18 to less than 65 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* refusal to participate
* Patients with acute shoulder pain (trauma, acute postsurgical pain)
* secondary adhesive capsulitis (prior surgery or non-surgically induced states of shoulder affection by adhesive capsulitis)
* hypersensitivity to amide local anesthetics
* general contraindications to SGB and cardiac and hepatic, renal or respiratory failure.
